name: Tumble Town (Mistiare, Tragicdragoon, DanielNeale, antiParadoxism)
description:
Justice is coming.

Produced by Microwave Fire.

The Game:

Wanted for your unforgivable crimes against the Cactus people, you, a lonesome tumbleweed - one of the last of your kind never stops tumblin'

Group project created for Plymouth Game Jam, theme - Untouchable

Controls - 

Mouse - Camera
WASD - Movement
Space - Jump 
R - Restart Level
Shift - Slo-mo
